meanings.definition: A person who addresses or directs speech or writing to a specific recipient.
meanings.sent1: The addressors in the meeting spoke clearly to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The addressors on the envelopes were neatly written.
meanings.sent3: The addressors at the party made sure everyone felt welcome.
meanings.sent4: The addressors of the letters guided them to the right destinations.
meanings.sent5: The addressors in the play delivered their lines with confidence.

meanings.definition: The act of addressing or directing speech or writing to a specific recipient.
meanings.sent1: The addressors of the emails were careful to include all necessary details.
meanings.sent2: The addressors during the ceremony were heartfelt and sincere.
meanings.sent3: The addressors of the jokes had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The addressors of the traffic ensured a smooth flow of vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The addressors of the invitations made sure to mention the dress code clearly.
